properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 9:55PM CST until January 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings NE
properties.description:
...Snow and gusty winds on Friday...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and south central
Nebraska.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to midnight CST Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow
could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact
the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will develop late morning into
midday, then become moderate intensity, at times, Friday
afternoon, accompanied by gusty north winds. A brief period of
sleet is possible around Beloit, Kansas in the early afternoon.
Snow will quickly taper off Friday evening, but continued gusty
winds may cause patchy blowing snow overnight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT
